scripts.build: ts-node src/index.ts && shx mkdir -p dist && vsce package --out ./dist/the-theme-0.0.1.vsix
scripts.install:all: npm run install:code && npm run install:cursor && npm run install:windsurf
scripts.uninstall:code: code --uninstall-extension mazhugasergei.the-theme || node -e "console.error('\x1b[41m ERROR \x1b[0m uninstall:code failed')"
scripts.uninstall:cursor: cursor --uninstall-extension mazhugasergei.the-theme || node -e "console.error('\x1b[41m ERROR \x1b[0m uninstall:cursor failed')"
scripts.uninstall:windsurf: windsurf --uninstall-extension mazhugasergei.the-theme || node -e "console.error('\x1b[41m ERROR \x1b[0m uninstall:windsurf failed')"
scripts.uninstall:all: npm run uninstall:code && npm run uninstall:cursor && npm run uninstall:windsurf
scripts.reinstall:code: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run uninstall:code && npm run install:code
scripts.reinstall:cursor: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run uninstall:cursor && npm run install:cursor
scripts.reinstall:windsurf: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run uninstall:windsurf && npm run install:windsurf
scripts.reinstall:all: npm run uninstall:all && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run install:all
